name: The Sage
description:
Enhanced potion mechanics.

New character, The Sage.

Character neutral content (cards, relics, potions, event).

*** ***** ***
LATEST UPDATE:
Base deck rework. Frail mechanic has been removed.
All cards with "Frail" theme now have a "low Flight" theme.
Flight mechanic reworked.
10 new images.*** ***** ***
This mod requires STSLib!
